tool_description: Compares required job skills against candidate skills to calculate match scores, identifying skill gaps and overlaps with weighted scoring.

required_skills.description: List of skills required for the position

candidate_skills.description: List of skills possessed by the candidate

fuzzy_matching.description: Enable fuzzy string matching for similar skills

match_threshold.description: Minimum similarity threshold for fuzzy matching (0.0-1.0)

error_messages: Empty skill lists: Both required_skills and candidate_skills must contain at least one item
Invalid skill weights: Weights must be numbers between 0.0 and 1.0
Mismatched arrays: skill_weights length must match required_skills length if provided
Invalid match threshold: match_threshold must be between 0.0 and 1.0
usage: Provide required_skills and candidate_skills arrays. Optionally set skill_weights for importance weighting and adjust match_threshold for fuzzy matching sensitivity.

matched_skills.description: Skills that matched between required and candidate

missing_skills.description: Required skills not found in candidate profile

additional_skills.description: Candidate skills not in required list

match_details.description: Detailed explanation of skill matching results
